module.name: Directory
module.changelog: *13.0.9* Support Alert Info drop down *13.0.8* FREEPBX-9951 Japanese language prompts *13.0.7* FREEPBX-10119 Fix recording prompts. *13.0.6* FREEPBX-10118 Spelling *13.0.5* FREEPBX-10121 Fix custom entries *13.0.4* FREEPBX-9821 Fix validations on adding custom entries, also spruce up visuals *13.0.3* FREEPBX-9609 Option to Limit IVR Direct Dialing to a Directory *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha3* Add Spanish prompts *13.0.1alpha2* Fix popover resolves FREEPBX-8993 for directory
